topic.title: Firefox browser problems using ZeroNet
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.5(rev3852)
  * Operating system: Win10 1902
  * Web browser: Firefox70.0
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:The node always shows updates, but it does not update properly.



#### Observed Results:
![ZeroNet](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38090383/67629878-7c9f5b00-f8b8-11e9-850c-65e301b68dc0.JPG)
![ZeroNet1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38090383/67629897-d1db6c80-f8b8-11e9-9540-ed8c6cb36d57.JPG)



#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
  * Can be updated normally

topic.title: 0.7.1Unable to start the program after unzipping
ZeroHello can be updated, why other sites can't be updated (showing 5 nodes)
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.7.1
  * Operating system: Win10 1909
  * Web browser: Firefox 70
  * Tor status: not available
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: _/

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
Trackers has turned on the proxy, how can I still not update the node?

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. _____
  2. _____
  3. _____

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?

1604067580_mirrored_dhueys_github.body:
> 
> 
> You can try using "check files" from site menu. Also, small updates happen from time to time, especially on multiuser sites. Have you waited for it to disappear for a while already?

I have clicked "Check files" and the results show that there is no peers. Is there any other feasible way?

1604067678_mirrored_dhueys_github.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version:0.6.5(rev3870)
  * Operating system: win10 1909
  * Web browser:Firefox
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port:closure
  * Special configuration: /

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Download and unzip 0.7.1
  2. Copy the code from 0.7.1 to the ZeroNet-win-dist code

#### Observed Results:

  Double click on ZereNet, no response (Nodes cannot be updated until 0.7.1 is not updated)

1604067680_mirrored_dhueys_github.body:
